title: Aaron Tabacchi
text:
Aaron Mattia Tabacchi (born 26 June 1998) is an Italian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Serie%20A">Serie A</a> for <a href="Bologna%20F.C.%201909">Bologna</a> on 15 May 2016 as an 83rd-minute substitute for <a href="Emanuele%20Giaccherini">Emanuele Giaccherini</a> in a game against <a href="A.C.%20ChievoVerona">Chievo</a>.
On 31 January 2019, he was loaned to <a href="Imolese%20Calcio%201919">Imolese</a>.
